events.name: Fireside Chat with P&G's Former Global President for E-Business
events.description:
RSVP for free here: ga.co/2if6nRZ

Join General Assembly in an exclusive fireside chat with e-commerce luminary Deb Henretta, Procter & Gamble (P&G)’s former Global President for E-Business. This session will be moderated by Gwendolyn Regina (Director of Strategy & Business Development, APAC, Mashable).

Deb has been named as one of Fortune Magazine's 50 Most Powerful Women in Business for seven consecutive years. Furthermore, on top of being appointed as a U.S. representative to the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC)’s Business Advisory Council (ABAC), Deb was also appointed by President Barack Obama to chair the 21-member ABAC in 2011, making her its first woman chairperson.

As a 30-year veteran of P&G, Deb has served in a diverse range of brand, marketing, and general management roles across a wide variety of businesses. In 2007, she expanded her role as Group President, P&G Asia before being appointed the Group President of Global E-Business at P&G until July 2015. She also sat on Singapore's Economic Development Board from August 2007 to January 2013 and is a Senior Advisor at General Assembly.

In this fireside chat, Deb will draw from her experience building iconic brands and share leadership lessons and her thoughts on the CPG and e-commerce industries. We will leave time at the end for questions from the audience as well.
